full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'DIR RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS DPA' PO GCIG PA'I RNAL 'BYOR LA BRTEN NAS SHES RAB CHE GSAL MYUR BA SOGS SGRUB PA'I TSUL NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG SHING GLANG LO GSER GYI RGYAL KHAB CHEN PO NAS PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN GZIGS CHEN POR GSER GYIS BKA' LUNG 'BUL BA'I TSAD DU BKAS MNGAGS PA MONG KHOL SBYOR KHANG GI SBYAR KHO CHIS BKAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BSTAN 'DZIN MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG ^RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,MAGNGGA LAm,, ,,)
